attributes.description: The BMW M340i xDrive Sedan exhibits a distinctly sporty character – both visually and technically – while being eminently suitable for everyday use. Striking accents in Cerium Grey metallic alongside the BMW double kidney grille in mesh design and sporty interior features underline the dynamic character of the vehicle. Powerful and efficient BMW M TwinPower Turbo engines with up to 275 kW interacting with precisely tuned chassis components such as the Adaptive M suspension guarantee sporty sheer driving pleasure and optimum handling
